name: Vodka
description: Neutral spirit, commonly used in a wide variety of cocktails.

name: Gin
description: Spirit flavored with juniper and botanicals, base for martinis and gin & tonic.

name: Light Rum
description: Pale rum with a clean, mild flavor, often used in daiquiris and mojitos.

name: Dark Rum
description: Aged rum with deeper, richer flavor and molasses notes.

name: Spiced Rum
description: Rum infused with warm spices like cinnamon and clove.

name: Coconut Rum
description: Sweet coconut-flavored rum, ideal for tiki and tropical cocktails.

name: Tequila
description: Unaged agave spirit with bright citrus and pepper notes.

name: Cachaça
description: Brazilian sugarcane spirit used in Caipirinhas, similar to light rum.

name: Triple Sec
description: Clear, orange-flavored liqueur for margaritas and classics.

name: Blue Curaçao
description: Bright blue, orange-flavored liqueur for colorful drinks.

name: Coffee Liqueur
description: Dark, sweet coffee-flavored liqueur for dessert drinks.

name: Amaretto
description: Sweet almond liqueur, great for Amaretto Sour and sippers.

name: Aperol
description: Italian aperitif with bitter orange and herbal notes.

name: Campari
description: Bitter-sweet Italian aperitif, key in Negronis and Spritzes.

name: Sweet Vermouth
description: Fortified wine liqueur for Manhattans and Negronis.

name: Dry Vermouth
description: Dry fortified wine for martinis and classic cocktails.

name: Brandy
description: Distilled wine spirit with rich, fruity flavor.

name: Prosecco
description: Italian sparkling wine for spritzes and celebratory cocktails.

name: White Wine
description: Light, crisp wine for wine-based cocktails.

name: Bourbon
description: American whiskey with sweet vanilla and oak notes.

name: Rye Whiskey
description: Spicier whiskey, classic in Old Fashioneds and Sazeracs.

name: Scotch Whisky
description: Peaty or smooth malted whisky from Scotland.

name: Irish Whiskey
description: Triple-distilled whiskey, lighter and smooth.

name: Absinthe
description: High-proof anise-flavored spirit, used sparingly in cocktails.

name: Club Soda
description: Carbonated water for highballs and refreshing cocktails.

name: Tonic Water
description: Bitter quinine soda for G&T and bitter-sweet drinks.

name: Cola
description: Classic cola soda for mixers like Rum & Coke.

name: Ginger Beer
description: Spicy, fermented mixer for Moscow Mules & Dark & Stormies.

name: Ginger Ale
description: Light ginger-flavored soda, milder than ginger beer.

name: Lemon-Lime Soda
description: Sweet citrus soda (e.g. Sprite) for fruity highballs.

name: Sparkling Lemonade
description: Fizzy lemonade for spritz-style and refreshing drinks.

name: Sparkling Water
description: Unflavored carbonated water alternative.

name: Coconut Water
description: Natural coconut liquid, light and hydrating.

name: Tomato Juice
description: Savory base for Bloody Marys and brunch cocktails.

name: Lemonade
description: Still lemonade for Vodka Lemonades and coolers.

name: Lime Juice
description: Fresh sour juice essential for margaritas and daiquiris.

name: Lemon Juice
description: Bright, tart juice used in sours and citrus cocktails.

name: Grapefruit Juice
description: Tart juice for Palomas, Greyhounds, and other citrusy drinks.

name: Sour Mix
description: Pre-mixed lemon/lime juice with sugar, used in sours.

name: Simple Syrup
description: Basic sugar-and-water syrup, foundation for sweetening.

name: Grenadine
description: Sweet pomegranate syrup for color and flavor.

name: Agave Syrup
description: Smooth agave-based sweetener, pairs well with tequila.

name: Honey Syrup
description: Honey-and-water syrup (1:1), great in whiskey or rum drinks.

name: Orgeat Syrup
description: Almond-flavored syrup for tiki cocktails like the Mai Tai.

name: Chocolate Syrup
description: Rich chocolate syrup for dessert-style cocktails.

name: Cream
description: Heavy cream or half-and-half for creamy cocktails.

name: Cream of Coconut
description: Thick, sweetened coconut cream for Piña Coladas.

name: Coconut Milk
description: Lighter alternative to cream of coconut in tropical drinks.

name: Orange Juice
description: Sweet citrus juice for screwdrivers and mimosas.

name: Pineapple Juice
description: Sweet-tart tropical juice for Piña Coladas and Mai Tais.

name: Cranberry Juice
description: Tart juice for Cosmopolitans and fruity punches.

name: Mango Juice
description: Sweet tropical juice for daiquiris and fruit-driven cocktails.

name: Peach Juice
description: Fruity juice for Bellinis and peachy cocktails.

name: Apple Juice
description: Sweet juice ideal for fall-themed cocktails.

name: Cherry Juice
description: Rich, sweet-tart juice for cherry cocktails.

name: Passion Fruit Juice
description: Tropical juice for tiki drinks and punches.

name: Watermelon Juice
description: Refreshing summer juice, best when strained.

name: Strawberry Puree
description: Fruit puree for Daiquiris and frozen cocktails.

name: Raspberry Puree
description: Bright berry puree for frosé and fruity drinks.

name: Passion Fruit Puree
description: Thick tropical puree for tiki-style cocktails.
